metadata.description: cc10x v4.0 - Orchestration plugin for systematic development

plugins.name: cc10x
plugins.description: Orchestration plugin for Claude Code. Provides 5 workflows: REVIEW (multi-dimensional code analysis), PLAN (requirements to architecture), BUILD (TDD implementation), DEBUG (systematic bug investigation), VALIDATE (cross-artifact consistency). Features: deterministic workflow selection, complexity gating, evidence-first verification, memory integration, workflow state persistence.
